resources.string: Please wait and do not exit the application until the process is completed ... The process may take some time, and if your device has simple specifications, it may take from three to ten minutes to wait
You can contact me if there is a problem or inquiry regarding the application on the communication platforms below
There is a bug, please enter the application at a later time
There was a problem with the server, please try again later
There is an error in the Wi-Fi network or from your device, please check
The application is under maintenance, please try again later
